name: Sanic
body:
The Sanic integration adds support for the Sanic Web Framework. We support the following versions:

  • 0.8
  • 18.12
  • 19.12
  • 20.12
  • Any version of the form x.12 (LTS versions).

We do support all versions of Sanic. However, Sanic versions between LTS releases should be considered Early Adopter. We may not support all the features in these non-LTS versions, since non-LTS versions change quickly and have introduced breaking changes in the past, without prior notice.

A Python version of 3.6 or greater is also required.

  1. Install sentry-sdk from PyPI:

    $ pip install --upgrade sentry-sdk

  2. If you're on Python 3.6, you also need the aiocontextvars package:

    $ pip install --upgrade aiocontextvars

  3. To configure the SDK, initialize it with the integration before or after your app has been initialized:

    import sentry_sdk
from sentry_sdk.integrations.sanic import SanicIntegration
from sanic import Sanic

sentry_sdk.init(
   dsn="___PUBLIC_DSN___",
   integrations=[
      SanicIntegration(),
   ],

   # Set traces_sample_rate to 1.0 to capture 100%
   # of transactions for performance monitoring.
   # We recommend adjusting this value in production,
   traces_sample_rate=1.0,
)

app = Sanic(__name__)
